name: Moya Tech Blog
description: A blogging engine for coders and photographers

SUPER_USER.description: Super user's username, enter your username here

SUPER_PASSWORD.description: Super user's password (change it when you first log in)

MOYA_SECRET.description: Some random characters for cookies and CSRF detection

MOYA_DEBUG.description: Set to 'yes' to enable debug mode (you can enable it later if you need to)

MOYA_PROJECT.description: The ./heroku directory contains custom setting for the Herokou platform

MOYA_PROJECT_INI.description: INI file to load settings from ('heroku.ini' for Heroki platform)

TECHBLOG_UPLOADS_LOCATION.description: filesystem for uploads, may be be directory or s3://S3_KEY:S3_SECRET@BUCKET

TECHBLOG_THUMBS_URL.description: URL that serves uploaded media, should be '/uploads/' or S3 static URL
